author: sky.cactus
content: We agreed at some point that Ethereum Magicians is required for discussions-to, but it appears EIP-1 still says it is just "suggested".  I thought I saw a PR at some point to strengthen that, am I misremembering or did it never get merged?  cc <@!642887713246150666> who may know.

author: poojaranjan
content:
Looking into the history of PRs, it looks like we made some changes to "discussion-to" links back in June last year. The PR basically removed all other suggestions from the EIP-1 (Gitter, Reddit) and kept Magicians there to direct people to the FEM page. 
After the last EIPIP meeting, now that people seems to have agreed to strongly recommend FEM, probably we can have new PR to update EIP-1.
